Windows¶

Upgrade digital license (hardware) to product key (OEM)¶

  1. Download Windows 10 ISO;

  2. Burn an ISO to an USB pen with Rufus, or Windows Media Creation Tool;

  3. Browse ‘/sources’ folder in burned USB pen, and add/change two files:

    • EI.cfg

    1
2
3
4
     [Channel]
 OEM
 [VL]
 0

    • PID.txt

    1
2
     [PID]
 Value=XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX
